description:
Just when Narse corners the heroes, an old friend swoops in to fight the rampaging dragon. Then, the group must make a grave decision when Karla offers to stop the resurrection of Kardis at the cost of their lives.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Witch... The One Who Maintains the Balance of Power
majo... Chikara no Kinkou o Tamotsu Mono
魔女... 力の均衡を保つ者
